https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTUxODM0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDg3MTgwMw@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,10,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Kundërgrushti
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Një boksier i ri, nga lagjet e varfëra të Majemit, me ëndrrën për të fituar Kampionatin e Dorezave të Arta, e gjen veten në udhekryq pasi diagnostifikohet me sëmundjen e bipolaritetit.
programme.category: Aksion
sport

programme.title: Zoti i luftës
programme.desc: 2017.Në shek. e 16-të, Komandanti i ushtrisë Kineze bashkon forcat me një Gjeneral të ri për të luftuar piratët që sulmojnë vazhdimisht fshatrat përgjatë bregut Kinez. Përballjet e jashtëzakonshme do të vendosin kush do t'i sundojë këto troje.
programme.category: Luftë
Histori

programme.title: Arturi dhe Merlini
programme.desc: Një riimagjinim i legjendës së mbretit Artur. Arturi, një luftëtar i dëbuar dhe Merlini një magjistar i vetmuar, bashkojnë forcat për të ndalur një njeri që kërkon shfarosjen e popullit Kelt.
programme.category: Aventurë

programme.title: Lugina e përleshjeve
programme.desc: Pasi motra e saj 22-vjeçare gjendet e vdekur në "Luginën e përleshjeve", një lagje ku ndeshesh për të bërë ca para, Uinsdor nis një hetim të sajin, ndërkohe që stërvitet për t'u përballur me vrasësin...
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Vullkani
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche. Në botë ka mbi 1500 vullkane aktivë për të cilët jemi në dijeni dhe të paktën një, për të cilin nuk dime gjë. Pikërisht ky kërcënon të marrë jetë njerëzish e të shkatërrojë një qytet të tërë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Të humbur në Paqësor
programme.desc: Një avion luksoz bën ulje të detyruar në një ishull misterioz pasi ndesh një stuhi të fuqishme mbi Oqeanin Paqësor. Teksa presin ekipin e shpëtimit, pasagjerët kuptojnë se ishulli fsheh një sekret që mund të jetë më i rrezikshëm se stuhia.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mbreti majmun 2
programme.desc: 500 vite pas ngjarjeve në filmin e parë, një murg në kërkim të disa shkrimeve të shenjta, çliron padashje Mbretin Majmun. Kur një demon në kërkim të përjetësisë u vihet pas, Mbreti Majmun bën të pamundurën për të mbrojtur murgun dhe njerëzimin.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi
aventurë

programme.title: Horizonti
programme.desc: Eric Balfour, Scottie Thompson, Brittany Daniel. Drita të mistershme mbi Los Anxheles, paralajmërojnë ardhjen e një race jashtëtokësore, që rrezikon shfarosjen e njerëzimit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Snajper 3
programme.desc: Qitesit Nr.1 te Marines Amerikane tani i duhet te perballet me nje armik te paparashikuar, shokun e tij te ngushte, i cili mendohej se ish vrare gjate luftimeve, por ne fakt kishte vazhduar aktivitetin e tij ne fshehtesi.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Batman: Hallouini i gjatë, Pjesa I
programme.desc: Një vrasje brutale ditën e Hallouinit shtyn Batmanin të bashkojë forcat me dy ligjvënësit e vetëm të pakorruptuar të qytetit, për të rrëzuar familjen e krimit, Falcone. Por kur më shumë vdekje ndodhin gjatë festave, bëhet e qartë se ata kanë të bëjnë gjit.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aksion
krim

programme.title: Musketieri
programme.desc: J.Chambers. Ne Parisin e shek. të 17, D'Artanjani e gjen veten përballë forcave të errëta që duan të marrin Francën nën kontroll. Ai kërkon të hakmerret për vrasjen e prindërve të tij. Zemra e tij zbutet vetëm nga një vajze e re fshatare.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Njeriu i Aksidenteve
programme.desc: Një vrasës gjakftohtë I njohur si "Njeriu u aksidenteve" shquhet per metodat e tij të përpikta, duke u njohur si më të mirin në treg. Jeta e tij ndryshon rrënjësisht kur nje person i dashur vritet nga ekipi i tij dhe ai vendos të hakmerret.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Planeti i majmunëve: Revolucioni
programme.desc: Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman. Shoqëria e majmunëve, me ne krye Çezarin është shumuar, zhvilluar dhe jeton në paqe. Një grup njerëzish të mbijetuar, duke fajësuar majmunët, kërkojnë hakmarrje dhe paqja delikate rrezikon të thyhet.
programme.category: Aksion
drame

programme.title: Misioni antiterror
programme.desc: 2019. Në ekip ndërkombëtar ushtarësh elitarë nga SHBA-ja, Rusia, Mbretëria e Bashkuar, Kina dhe Franca bashkojnë forcat për të neutralizuar një grup të ri ekstremist që po shkakton terror në Lindjen e Mesme.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Skuadra e vajzave luftëtare
programme.desc: Amy Johnston, Dolph Lundgren. Një ish-luftëtare i rikthehet jetës që kishte braktisur, për të shpëtuar të motrën nga bota e ndeshjeve ilegale dhe nga maniaku që e drejton atë.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Betejë urbane
programme.desc: Steven Seagal, Meghan Ory. E kaluara e Elijah Kane në forcat speciale do të vendosë në rrezik gjithë skuadrën e tij. Ndërkohë ata duhet të ndalin edhe një përdhunues, i cili ka filluar të ekzekutojë viktimat e tij...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Harley Davidson/Malboro Man
programme.desc: M.Rourke, D.Johnson. Motoçiklisti Harli dhe kauboji Malborou mësojnë se një mik i vjetër do të humbasë lokalin, pasi një banke do të ndërtojë aty një kompleks të ri. Prandaj ata do të grabisin banken, por jo gjithçka do të shkoje sipas planit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Zonja Luftetare
programme.desc: 2016. Një vajzë e re amerikane udhëton përmes botës së errët të Hong Kongut për të marrë pjesë në një turne elitar femrash. Tek fiton çdo raund, ajo afrohet më shumë ose me titullin si luftëtarja më e mirë në botë, ose me vdekjen.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Mbreti Akrep
programme.desc: Një luftetar i shkretetires ngrihet kunder ushtrise armike qe po shkaterron atdheun e tij. Ai kap magjistaren kryesore te kundershtareve, e çon larg ne shkretetire, dhe pergatitet per nje shikim te fundit te fatit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në krahët e shqiponjës
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes. Historia e mahnitshme e atletit Olimpik Skocez, Eric Liddell, i cili u kap rob dhe u torturua nga Japonezët gjatë Luftës së Dytë Botërore.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Mbreti Majmun 3
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok. Mbreti Majmun dhe shkokët e tij kapen robër nga mbretëresha e një vendi që popullohet vetëm nga femra, e cila beson se prania e udhëtarëve paralajmëron shkatërrimin e botës së tyre.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Katastrofë në Tokë
programme.desc: Kolin është në prag mbylljes së një marrëveshjeje të madhe, kur një katastrofë godet planetin. Ai zgjohet pas 11 muajsh vetëm për të zbuluar se, në një fare mënyre, është përgjegjës për ngjarjen që shkatërroi Tokën.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Guximtarët
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2011. Nga krijuesit e 'Zjarri i dashurisë', vjen një tjetër dramë kristiane. Kjo është historia e 4 policëve, bashkëshortë dhe baballarë të cilët pas një tragjedie, vihen përballë frikës, shpresës dhe besimit në Zot.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Eskorta
programme.desc: Lyndsy Fonseca. I dëshpëruar për një histori të mirë, Mitç, një gazetar me varësi nga seksi, eksploron botën e eskortave të luksit kur bind një prostitutë që ka studiuar në univeristetin e Standford-it, ta mbajë si shoqërues.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi romantike

programme.title: Krimi i Lilandit
programme.desc: Ryan Gosling, Don Cheadle, Kevin Spacey. Një mësues në një qendër riedukimi, përpiqet të mësojë se ç'e shtyu një adoleshent për të vrarë moshatarin e tij. Një krim që nxjerr në pah këndvështrimin e adoleshentit për botën që e rrethon.
programme.category: Dramë psikologjike

programme.title: Rripi i kuq
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Tim Allen. Një instruktor i arteve marciale, i cili gjithë jetën ia kishte kushtuar sportit dhe integritetit, tundohet nga një ofertë që mund t'i sjellë famë e para. Por çmimi që duhet të paguajë mund të rrënojë gjithçka.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Kurajë për të jetuar
programme.desc: AnnaSophia Robb, Dennis Quaid, Helen Hunt. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë! Pas sulmit të një peshkaqeni, një vajzë e re humbet krahun. Me ndihmën e familjes dhe besimin në Zot, ajo arrin të gjejë kurajën për të vazhduar ëndrrën...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Një ditë
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway, Jim Sturgess. Pasi kalojnë natën e diplomimit bashkë, Deksteri dhe Ema tregohen në po të njëjtën ditë në 20 vitet e ardhshme për të parë se ku ndodhen me jetën e tyre...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Jetohet veç një herë
programme.desc: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol. Pas fejesës së njërit prej tyre, tre miq që në fëmijëri, ndërmarrin një udhëtim të paharrueshëm. Një udhëtim që do t'u tregojë se jetohet veç një herë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Shtegu i zjarrit
programme.desc: Hrithik Roshan, Priyanka Chopra. Një riprodhim mjaft i arrirë i filmit kult të vitit 1990. Një djalosh, bëhet dëshmitar i vrasjes së babait të tij. Vite më vonë, ai rikthehet në qytetin e lindjes i vendosur për t'u hakmarrë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Shtëpia në Palos Verdes
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner. Jeta e re në një periferi idilike bregdetare të Kalifornisë, shkatërron një familje. Adoleshentja Medina detyrohet të bëhet forca që mban bashkë pjesën e mbetur të familjes, ndërkohë që zbulon një pasion të ri për sërfin.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Realiteti i një fëmije
programme.desc: Jenny Slate, Jake Lacy. Pas një nate pasionante, që rezulton në një shtatzani të padëshiruar, një komediane 20 e ca vjeçare aspak serioze, duhet të përballet me realitetin e të pasurit një fëmijë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Copëza parajse
programme.desc: Kate Hudson, Gael García Bernal. Pas një vizite tek doktori, jeta e një vajze plot gjallëri do të ndryshojë rrënjësisht. Bashkë me doktorin, ajo fillon një rrugëtim ku do të përjetojë ndjenja që s'i kishte parashikuar kurrë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Shpirtra binjakë
programme.desc: Adrianne Palicki, Brian Klugman. Dy njerëz që nuk përshtatet aspak me njëri tjetrin, përpiqen të lënë mënjanë gabimbet e të kaluarës, për t'i dhënë një mundësi dashurisë mes tyre...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Magjia e shtrigës së mirë
programme.desc: Cassie Nightingale është një shtrigë që përdor fuqitë e saj për të ndihmuar të tjerët. Ndërsa planifikon një dasmë familjare, ajo mirëpret një grua misterioze që endet në qytet. Ardhja e saj përkon me një sërë sfidash me të cilat, Cassie dhe i gjithë qyte.
programme.category: Dramë
fantazi

programme.title: Në tokën e Gjakut dhe Mjaltit
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie, në filmin e parë si regjisore dhe skenariste. Gjatë luftës së Bosnjes, një grua boshnjake dikur në dashuri me një serb, ritakohet me të në një kamp të burgosurish. Por tani lufta rrezikon t'u shkatërrojë përgjithmonë lumturinë.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Nën trysni
programme.desc: Morris Chestnut, Taraji Henson. Vite mosmarrëveshjesh mbi lumturinë e vërtetë dhe suksesin, kanë vënë në dilemë martesën e një çifti. Por sprova e vërtetë do të vijë kur ata përfshihen në një aksident me makinë...
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Z. Askushi
programme.desc: Jared Leto, Sarah Polley, Diane Kruger. Në vitin 2092, një njeri 118 vjeçar i tregon jetën e tij një reporteri, duke u fokusuar në 3 momente vendimtare dhe rrugët e ndryshme që ai mund të kishte zgjedhur.
programme.category: Dramë romantike
fantazi

programme.title: E burgosur në liri
programme.desc: Maggie Gyllenhaal. Pasi kalon 3 vjet në burg, një grua përpiqet të rifitojë zemrën e vajzës së saj, e cila thuajse nuk e mban mend...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Profesioni shpikës
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey, Camilla Belle, Heather Graham. Pas 8 vitesh në burg, një shkencëtar dikur i famshëm, përpiqet të riparojë marrëdhënien me familjen, ndërkohë që përpiqet edhe të jetë sërish më i miri në profesionin e tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Sezoni i uraganit
programme.desc: Forest Whitaker. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë, që frymëzoi miliona njerëz. Një vit pas uraganit Katrina, një trajner basketbolli, formon një skuadër me nxënës nga shkolla të ndryshme dhe i kthen ata në kampionë të shtetit.
programme.category: SportLife

programme.title: Pa planifikim
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Gjithçka që Abby dëshironte, ishte të ndihmonte gratë. Si një drejtuese e re e një klinike për planifikimin familjar, ajo besonte në të drejtën e gruas për të zgjedhur. Deri kur ajo pa diçka që ndryshoi gjithçka.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Rastësisht fatlum
programme.desc: Farhan Akhtar, Konkona Sen Sharma. Një vështrim në të dyja anët e kinemasë së Bullivudit. Historitë e një djali dhe një vajze, të cilët në rrugëtimin drejt famës, përballen me intriga dhe vështirësi që mund t'i ndajnë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Varreza e kafshëve
programme.desc: Jason Clarke. Bazuar në romanin tmerrues të Sephen King. Pasi familja Creed transferohet, ata zbulojne një varrëze të lashtë pranë shtëpisë së re. Kur tragjeditë godasin, një reaksion zinxhir ngjarjesh çlirojnë një të keqe të pathyeshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Bill djali
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Chris Pratt. Një 14-vjeçar lidh një alenacë të pazakontë me sherifin e zonës Pat Garret dhe me të jashtëligjshmin 'Billy the Kid', në një mision për të shpëtuar të motrën nga duart e xhaxhait të tyre të dhunshëm.
programme.category: Biografi
Uestern
Aksion

programme.title: Zoti Çërç
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy, Britt Robertson. Një vajzë e vogël dhe nëna e saj, që vuan nga një sëmundje e rëndë, marrin në punë një kuzhinier të talentuar. Marrëveshja e punës 6-mujore do të shtrihet në 15 vite dhe në 1 lidhje familjare të përhershme.
programme.category: Komedi
drame

programme.title: Made in Italy
programme.desc: Një film nga Luciano Ligabue. Me Stefano Accorsi, Kasia Smutniak. Një burrë rreth të pesëdhjetave vë në pikëpyetje të shkuarën dhe vendos të ndryshojë rrënjësisht jetën e tij.
programme.category: Dramë
Komedi

programme.title: Pasi u njohëm
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin best-seller të Anna Todd-it. Kur Tesa, një vajzë e mbarë dhe me ambicje, takohet me rebelin tërheqës Hardin Skot, do të fillojë të dyshojë mbi gjithçka që ajo mendonte për veten dhe mbi atë që dëshironte nga jeta.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Doktor Dulitëll
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr., Antonio Banderas, Michael Sheen. Një mjek që mund të flasë me kafshët nis një aventurë epike në kërkim të një ishulli mitik, i shoqëruar nga një nxënës i ri dhe ekupiazhi i kafshëve të tij ekzotike me karaktere të çuditshme.
programme.category: Fantazi
komedi
aventurë

programme.title: Jetë letrash
programme.desc: Në rrugët e Stambollit, Mehmeti, i cili menaxhon një depo mbeturinash për riciklimin e letrës në një zonë të varfër, gjen një djalë tetë vjeç dhe vendos ta ndihmojë për të gjetur prindërit, pa e kuptuar se sa i lidhur është me këtë fëmijë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Duar të gurta
programme.desc: Edgar Ramírez, Robert De Niro. Jeta dhe karriera e boskierit legjendar Roberto Duran dhe trajnerit të tij po aq legjendar Ray Arcel, që i ndryshuan rrënjësisht jetën njëri-tjetrit.
programme.category: Biografi
sport

programme.title: Kthimi i Benit
programme.desc: Julia Roberts, Lucas Hedges. Dashuria pa kushte e një nëne do të sprovohet ndërsa ajo bën gjithçka që mundet për ta mbajtur të birin larg botës së drogës, pasi kthehet në shtëpi nga rehabilitimi.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ti më përket mua
programme.desc: Karriera e një psikiatri (Casey Affleck) do të vihet në rrezik, kur pacientja e tij vetvritet. Por kur shtëpinë e tij do ta vizitojë vëllai i së ndjerës (Sam Claflin), jeta e psikiatrit, gruas (Michelle Monaghan) dhe vajzës së tij, do të marrë një kthesë.
programme.category: Dramë
Mister
Thriller

programme.title: Ava
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain, Colin Farrell, John Malkovich. Ava është një vrasëse e punësuar nga një organizatë misterioze për të ekzekutuar persona të profilit të lartë. Pasi një punë shkon tmerrësisht keq, shënjestra e rradhës së organizatës bëhet ajo vetë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Venom - Helmi
programme.desc: Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams. Gazetari investigativ Eddie Brock përpiqet të rikthehet në detyrë pas një skandali, por aksidentalisht bëhet organizmi strehues i një alieni simbiotik që i jep superfuqi dhe e transformon atë në Venom...
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Akt hakmarrjeje
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas. I shkatërruar nga vrasje e bashkëshortes dhe të bijes, një ish-avokat gojëtar, betohet për heshtje deri në momentin kur do të zbulojë vrasësin, ndërsa stërvit veten për misionin e hakmarrjes.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Çështja Snouden
programme.desc: Regjisori fitues i çmimit Oskar, Oliver Stone sjell historinë e patreguar të Edward Snowden, njeriut më kontrovers që ekspozoi përgjimin e jashtëligjshëm të Agjencisë të Sigurimit Amerikan...
programme.category: Biografi
thriller

programme.title: Varfanjakët e pasur 2
programme.desc: Me Christian De Sica. E mbani mend familjen Tuçi? Pak vite më parë fituan 100 milion euro në llotari. Por sot ata kanë kuptuar se lluksi nuk mjafton, pushteti është fitorja e vërtetë. E ku ka më mirë sesa politika.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Diell në mesnatë
programme.desc: Bella Thorne. Kejt vuan nga 1 sëmundje që nuk e lejon të dalë në diell, ndaj sa bie nata, ajo shkon tek stacioni i trenit t'i bjerë kitarës. Kur njihet me Çarlin, vendos t'ia fshehë sëmundjen, ndërsa nisin një romancë gjatë 1 vere gati ideale...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Vajza të mbara
programme.desc: Ambra Angolini. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Në Itali, në fillim të viteve '80, katër gra të armatosura me armë dhe bigodina, provojnë të ndryshojnë rrjedhën e jetës së tyre duke grabitur një bankë të maskuar si burra.
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: Hellboy: Kthim nga ferri
programme.desc: David Harbour, Milla Jovovich. Superheroi legjendar gjysmë demon, Hellboy, i zënë midis botës së mbinatyrshme dhe asaj njerëzore, ndeshet me një magjistare të lashtë, e cila kërkon hakmarrje ndaj një tradhtie te vjetër.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Miq Armiq
programme.desc: Matthias Schoenaerts. Driss dhe Manuel u rritën si vëllezër, por ndoqën drejtime të kundërta në jetë: Manueli u bë kriminel, ndërsa Driss, polic. Kur dy burrat ritakohen, kuptojnë se kanë nevojë për njëri-tjetrin për të mbijetuar në botët e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë
thriller

programme.title: Porosia e fundit
programme.desc: Liam Neeson. Xhim, një ish marins, jeton i vetmuar në një fermë përgjatë kufirit Arizonë-Meksikë. Por jeta e tij e qetë prishet, kur ai përpiqet të mbrojë një djalë në arrati nga anëtarët e një karteli droge...
programme.category: Aksion
Thriller

programme.title: Misioni për në hënë
programme.desc: Në rast dështimi të misionit "Apollo 11", CIA ka në plan që të bindë regjisorin e famshëm Stanley Kubrick të xhirojë një ulje të rreme në hënë. Por një ngatërresë e vogël, ndërlikon paksa misionin...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Tre amigos
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase, Martin Short. Ata janë tre aktorë të papunë që do të pranojnë të luajne banditët në një fshat Meksikan, pa e ditur që gjithçka është e vërtetë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Kapësit e fantazmave 1
programme.desc: A mund te shpetohet bota nga krijesat e gjelberta dhe te vogla te quajtura fantazma? Kete do te tentojne ta bejne tre shoket qe do te formojne skuadren e kapesve te fantazmave.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Më mban mend mua?
programme.desc: 2014. Ambra Angiolini, Edoardo Leo. Ai është kleptoman, ndërsa asaj i humbet kujtesa sa herë përjeton një emocion të fortë. A do mundet dashuria që ndjejnë për njëri tjetrin, ti shërojë?
programme.category: Komedi Italiane

programme.title: Të sapomartuarit
programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher, Brittany Murphy. Një çift i ri të sapomartuarish nisen në udhëtim për muajin e mjaltit, por rrugës do të hasin shumë pengesa të cilat do të vënë në sfide aftesine e tyre per te mbajtur gjalle kete martese.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Profesori boksier
programme.desc: Kevin James, Bas Rutten, Salma Hayek. Nje 40-të vjeçar, aspak në formë, punon si mësues bilogjie. Por kur problemet ekonomike, kërcënojnë ta nxjerrin të papunë, ai fillon të ndeshet në ring edhe pse nuk ia thotë fare nga ky profesion...
programme.category: Komedi
sport

programme.title: Regjisori i krisur
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Eddie Murphy. Bobi Bowfinger, regjizori më pak i suksesshëm i Hollivudit, arrin ta shndërrojë Kit Ramsesin në një yll të kinemasë, me anë të një plani djallëzor, dhe me ndihmën e vëllait të tij binjak.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Telekomanda
programme.desc: A.Sandler, K.Beckinsale. Duke kërkuar nëpër shtëpi telekomanden, Michael Newman gjen nje model të çuditshëm të shpikur nga dr.Morty. Me këtë telekomande, ai s'ndryshon vetëm kanalet, por mund të vere në 'Pause' edhe jetën e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Udhëtim me një rok star
programme.desc: Jonah Hill, Russell Brand. Një asistent i ri i një kompanie muzikore dërgohet në Londër, për të bindur një legjendë roku të shthurur, që të japë koncert në Los Anxhelos...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Kështu them unë
programme.desc: Diane Keaton, Mandy Moore. Një nënë beqare e tri vajzave të rritura, përpiqet të gjejë burrin e duhur për njërën prej tyre. Por ndonjëherë jeta ka të tjera plane dhe është më mirë që gjithçka të vijë natyrshëm...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: W.Smith. Nëse shkon në Nju Jork duhet të takosh se s'bën Hiçin. Ai është mblesi më i famshëm. Ai të gjen vajzën e ëndrrave. Sara Melasit, gazetares i ka shkrepur në kokë të zbuloje legjendën e doktorit-mbles dhe do të kapet mat!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Embëlsi Amerikane 3-Dasma
programme.desc: Filmi i tretë i serisë American Pie paraqet dasmën e Jim dhe Michelle dhe të gjithë te afërmit dhe miqtë që janë mbledhur me këtë rast, përfshire shokët e vjeter te Jim-it nga shkolla e mesme dhe motrën e vogël të Michelle.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shkolla e Vdekjes
programme.desc: 2018. Michael Sheen, Simon Pegg. Një kolegj elitar britanik kthehet në një fushëbetejë të përgjakshme, kur një gropë e thellë misteroze shfaqet papritmas aty pranë, duke çliruar horrore të pashpjegueshme.
programme.category: Horror
komedi

programme.title: Zbavitje makabre
programme.desc: Naomi Watts, Tim Roth, Michael Pitt. Dy adoleshentë, rrëmbejnë një familje dhe fillojnë me ta një zbavitje makabre, duke iu dhënë një ditë kohë për t'ju mbijetuar torturave.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Instinkt
programme.desc: 1999. Një thriller psikologjik me Anthony Hopkins dhe Cuba Gooding Jr të dy fitues të çmimin oskar. Misteret e një psikiatri që kërkon të lexojë mendimet e një njeriu që ka jetuar për vite të tëra në xhungël i veçuar nga bota.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Perrieri do hakmarrje
programme.desc: Cillian Murphy, Brendan Gleeson, Jim Broadbent. Një batakçi, babai i tij i sëmurë dhe fqinja e tyre bukuroshe, përpiqen t'i shmangen një gangsteri me emër, i cili kërkon hakmarrje për vrasjen e një prej ushtarëve të tij...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Unë jam nëna
programme.desc: 2019. Hilary Swank, Luke Hawker. Pas zhdukjes së njerëzimit, një vajzë e vogël rritet nga një robot i quajtur "Nëna", i krijuar për të ripopulluar tokën. Ardhja e një gruaje të plagosur trondit botën e vajzës dhe kërcënon lidhjen nënë-bijë.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Juria
programme.desc: 2003. Dustin Hoffman, Gene Hackman. Një punonjës i sapopushuar nga puna, kthehet në zyrë me një arme dhe vret tërë kolegët e tij. Vejusha e njërit prej viktimave do të padisë një prodhues armësh.
programme.category: Regjia: Gary Fleder

programme.title: Krim në qytezë
programme.desc: Kur një ish-polic i alkoolizuar gjen një grua në prag vdekjeje, vendos të gjejë vrasësin edhe si një mënyrë për të shlyer gabimet e të kaluarës. Por ky do të jetë një akt i rrezikshëm vetëshpengimi.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vrasje për drejtësi
programme.desc: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino. Dy hetues veteranë të policisë thirren për të zbuluar të vërtetën e një vrasësi, i cili ekzekuton kriminelët që i kanë shpëtuar drejtësisë. Të jetë ky një vrasës i pashpirt, apo një 'hero' që kërkon drejtësi?
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Strofulla e djallit
programme.desc: Colin Firth, Reese Witherspoon. Një histori e vërtetë mbi misterin e vrasjes së tre fëmijëve në një qytet të vogël. Policia akuzon tre adoleshentë për vrasje gjatë një rituali satanik, por e vërteta mund të jetë më e frikshme.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Pas më ke
programme.desc: 2013. Lajmi i zhdukjes së një shkencëtari në mënyrë misterioze gjatë një udhëtimi pune, trondit gruan dhe djalin e tij. Vite më vonë, i biri i vendosur për të gjetur të atin, bën një zbulim mahnitës që ka lidhje me zhdukjen e tij.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Instinkti vrasës
programme.desc: Nikolas Cage. Një gjahtar i zoti që po transporton kafshë të rralla dhe të rrezikshme me anije, duhet të përdorë të gjithë aftësitë e tij për të kapur një tjetër krijesë vdekjeprurëse, një të burgosur të dhunshëm që endet i lirë në bord.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: I See You
Vidim te
programme.desc: I See You: Directed by Adam Randall. With Helen Hunt, Jon Tenney, Owen Teague, Judah Lewis. Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6079516/","name":"I See You","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzVkOWM5YTEtMDdkNi00YjMzLWEzNWEtODEwN2IyZTc4Yjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjc5MTg0MzQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Strange occurrences plague a small town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a young boy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6079516/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very creative - albeit over the top, writing","reviewBody":"Novice director Adam Randall did an excellent job behind the camera and in directing his cast. All casting and performances were spot-on, with the exception of Helen Hunt, who seemed spaced-put and truly on all those pills she was popping. The score was perfection, creating the perfect tension and suspense. This film was actor Devon Graye's first screenplay, and he hit it out of the ballpark. Some of the twists were certainly over the top and there were some plot and technical issues, but for an amateur screenwriter, he did better than some recent seasoned writers' films I've seen lately. In comparison, his writing was genius. The 96 min runtime was perfect, but I felt the start was too slow and the ending too fast. I would've liked to have seen more even pacing. Nevertheless, I really enjoyed it and my head is still spinning from the plot twists. I'm definitely going to see it again. A well deserved 9/10 from me"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":43209,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-12-10","keywords":"phrogging,kidnapping,infidelity,murder,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2866921241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855103/","name":"Jon Tenney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4977122/","name":"Owen Teague"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1726691/","name":"Adam Randall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493361/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362154/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1984458/","name":"Devon Graye"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Justice League
Liga pravednika
programme.desc:
Justice League: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Gal Gadot. Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0974015/","name":"Justice League","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWVhZjZkYTItOGIwYS00NmRkLWJlYjctMWM0ZjFmMDU4ZjEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his new-found ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0974015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eddie_baggins"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Avenger's this is not","reviewBody":"You have to feel sorry for DC Comics.

Sure they've made more than a bucket load of cash with many of their releases, including of course this year's box office behemoth and critical darling Wonder Woman, but overall the company has been living in the shadows of Marvel for a number of years now and have been late to the party when it comes to superhero team-up events until now.

Suffering a troubled production that saw original director Zack Snyder depart the project late in the piece due to a family tragedy and replaced by Avenger's mastermind Joss Whedon, Justice League has had a far from smooth run to cinemas, that includes the fact we've never truly been properly introduced to its new main players, Aquaman, The Flash and Cyborg, with DC keen to get this ensemble together as quickly as possible.

Considering all of this, Justice League is not what I'd call a "bad" movie, in the sense that I'd warn everyone against seeing it, but this often jumbled and sometimes just not that interesting blockbuster is still far from the all-round winner DC would've been hoping for with Snyder and Whedon's film lacking both a genuinely good story arc (new villain Steppenwolf is just generic baddie 101 or even worse) and any true memorable set-pieces or set-ups.

At what feels like a fairly brisk 120 minute runtime, Justice League is always on the move as we initially get to witness the first meetings between this collection of new friends (the highlight of which is probably Ezra Miller's pizza eating Barry Allen/The Flash) but with so many people, so many different arcs to play out, Snyder and Whedon struggle to bring it all home and action scenes often feel haphazard, some scenes feel rushed or unwanted (a Russian family is given far too much screen time), while all the films colourful characters don't get the airtime they perhaps needed.

After the middling response so far to his take on Batman, Affleck won't be gaining or losing too many supporters here, the verdict is well and truly still out on Cavill's take on Superman, while Gadot is once again great as Wonder Woman. Of the new cast Miller is a fine addition as the awkward Allen, Jason Momoa gives fans hope that his standalone Aquaman will be a lot of fun, while it's surprising just how affecting Ray Fisher is as Cyborg even if his character doesn't seem cut out to get his own standalone feature.

It's a shame then that we don't ever feel like this team is given the scenarios they needed to really gel together. There's chemistry to be found here, even Cavill and Affleck benefit from the likes of Gadot and the new additions, their rather tiresome portrayals enlivened by the fresh, energetic nature of their co-stars but overall the film lacks an energy or pizazz that would've been the kicker to elevate this genuine middle of the road experience to something else entirely.

Final Say – 

All in all huge fans of DC will be kept happy with this sometimes enjoyable, sometimes downright bad big screen culmination of hero's and one badly CGI'd and generic villain.

Devoid of anything of true note and without a memorable set-piece, Justice League is unquestionably the poor cousin of The Avenger's but with the talented cast involved, there is enough hope here to suggest that this band of hero's have some room to grow into something special if all the stars align.

programme.title: Ratatouille
Juhu-hu
programme.desc:
Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tedg"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hyper Reality","reviewBody":"Its easy to see how this story came about. Animators are puppeteers first. So if you asked an animator to come up with a story, naturally you will find two features: one would involve two on-screen characters, one the animator of the other. We have many jokes associated with how imperfectly the on-screen animator (our hero) works his puppet at first. Incidentally, this movie is preceded in the theater by a short: "Lifting." It features a novice "animator" of precisely this type, being graded. Notice the infinite panel of switches in that short.

Count on Pixar to find yet another way to fold introspection into the form. This is elaborated by the character of a critic. We see him first in a coffin-like office. He's only capable of destruction it seems. Voiced by Peter O'Toole in a stentorian voice-about-theater, he likes what he sees (tastes). Its a great trick you see. Usually this trick is in the form of an on screen audience watching some sort of climactic performance. When they cheer, we do too, as we become folded into the story.

In this case, that is handled by a place made for us and occupied by "the critic." So we have a place in the story for the animator and the viewer. What else? We'll need a place for the animation, right? And we have it.

It appears first as a book by a now dead, corpulent chef. This book, natch, comes alive. Look how "Ted's law" is followed: the distance between the "real" world of ourselves and the animated movie is the same as that from the animated movie and the "living cartoon" within. Its an explicit fold. And the fact that the inner cartoon has an open, personal feel to it conveys to the personal feel we are intended to have with the Pixar movie.

So these three folds: in the story is the story, the animator and the viewer. And the introductory short sets this up too.

Having said that, there are a couple noteworthy segments. In terms of the actual craft, Pixar has two areas in which it innovates.

One of these in how space is handled. The Pixar guys realized early on that if the three dimensions are going to be modeled anyway, you can zip the camera around in new ways. Early in the game they did this in an overt way. That's been picked up by the summer action films, the best of them, including the Depp pirate business. (Another Disney project benefiting from the eye motion lab.)

You can see this throughout the project: there are both all sorts of well managed, unusual perspectives, and a constant overlay of new shots. By this I mean that every shot is just a little different than what you've seen. Just a little canted. A little closer perhaps. A little movement that a physical camera cannot do well.

But there are some big production sequences as well. I'm particularly interested in architectural water. Its a unique cinematic challenge. Its not one done well in animation because the mathematics of simply making water look real is daunting. Pixar has done what needs to be done: they have made water hyper-real, dramatic. There's a sequence here that is something like that Pinnochio sequence of 67 years ago with the whale. But its so new and fresh and exciting. Look at the water and see that it has a million tiny agents all seeking to be angry  to do damage but never reaching consensus on just how to attack. This alone is worth the admission.

There's another thing that is uniquely Pixar: how characters move. Its a tricky thing, that. As with the water, it is not ever enough that they move realistically. You can make realistic movements by outfitting actors with sensors and translating that to the created beings. It captures nuance. And if you have a particularly skilled source actor, he or she will move not as a real person would, but as an actor would to convey reality. Real isn't real. We need hyperreal in special ways to get- read the reality.

The credits of this movie ostentatiously say that ""Our Quality Assurance Guarantee: 100% Genuine Animation! No motion capture or any other performance shortcuts were used in the production of this film." You can see it. We are entering a new era where both the cameras and the characters can use dramatic motions not possible with human eyes and bodies.

Its a challenge for viewers. What do we accept as embodiment? So far, the answer is that the non-natural movements must always be in the service of conveying or seeming natural. But I imagine at the speed this is developing, we may soon see something more.

One character note: Colette is voiced by the remarkable Janeane Garofalo. As with our hero, she has that French nose. As the love develops between these two, she becomes decidedly more sexy, both in voice and appearance. Its the appearance that I remark on here. Its all done with postures and a motorcycle. That motorcycle is there in part to allow her to bend forward, and change her lower anatomy. 

These folks at Pixar are good. Darn good. Glad its Steve Jobs as the creative inspiration instead of that evil other guy.

Ted's Evaluation -- 3 of 3: Worth watching."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":672861,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Harry Potter i Kamen Mudraca
programme.desc:
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Richard Harris, Maggie Smith, Robbie Coltrane, Saunders Triplets. An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241527/","name":"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ3NWNlNmQtMTE5ZS00MDdmLTlkZjUtZTBlM2UxMGFiMTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjUwNzk3NDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241527/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvinashPatalay"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Alohomora - of the magical world...","reviewBody":"I watched this movie first time when I was left with no choice. My expectations were extremely low as I always wondered if Harry Potter books were over-hyped. How-ever after watching the movie it did make me a Harry Potter movie fan. And needless to say - this continues to remain my favourite of HP series. That brings to a point here.... the effect of expectations over a movie. True, expectations reduce joy.

Without going into the story I would certainly say Chris Columbus churns out a perfect pot-pourri of emotions, suspense and magic, delivering something appealing to all ages.

Every character brought to life on screen has done justice and leave an impression on you. Particularly notable performances by Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.

CGI are in plenty and made good of. The Quedditch game is picturised amazingly. The wizard's chess is treat to eyes.

Let's hope that the forthcoming HP series carries the similar magical touch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":704449,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2002-01-16","keywords":"magic,wizard,school of magic,based on novel,orphan","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3115057433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhlM2UyYTEtOThkZS00MTAyLWFlOGQtNzIwNTc5ZmVkOWQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhlM2UyYTEtOThkZS00MTAyLWFlOGQtNzIwNTc5ZmVkOWQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001321/","name":"Richard Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.title: The White Lotus
Bijeli lotos
programme.desc: The White Lotus: Created by Mike White. With Jennifer Coolidge, Murray Bartlett, Connie Britton, Alexandra Daddario. Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt13406094/","name":"The White Lotus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWY1YjY1MWUtYWY5Yi00YTM4LTkyM2UtMDQ3NmFiYTkyYjlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt13406094/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"getyourTVtogether"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"New Genre: CRINGE","reviewBody":"Welcome to the new genre of "Cringe". High production values; stellar acting. Want to relax by feeling uncomfortable for 6 hours? This is the show for you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36928,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-07-11","keywords":"male explicit nudity,satire,social commentary,one week time span,social satire","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177639/","name":"Jennifer Coolidge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0058864/","name":"Murray Bartlett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0110168/","name":"Connie Britton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0193472/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925234/","name":"Mike White"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1544732697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRkZmMyYmMtNDNiYi00MDYyLTgyYTEtNmVhYjcwZTljZWRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Among the employees at The White Lotus are the fastidious resort manager Armond (Murray Bartlett), who, after a sudden trauma, begins a dramatic downward spiral - and the down-to-earth spa manager, Belinda (Natasha Rothwell) who gets taken on an emotional roller coaster ride by a needy guest. The vacationers include the Mossbacher family - Nicole (Connie Britton), a successful type-A exec, who can't help but treat her family like disobedient employees; her husband, Mark (Steve Zahn), dealing with both an embarrassing health crisis and a terminal inferiority complex; their teenaged son, Quinn (Fred Hechinger), a socially awkward gamer, experiencing the wonder of nature for the very first time; their daughter, Olivia (Sydney Sweeney), and her friend, Paula (Brittany O'Grady), sharp-tongued college sophomores who cast a sardonic eye on the lifestyles and belief systems of everyone around them. The handsome, entitled Shane Patton (Jake Lacy) is here with his beautiful bride, Rachel (Alexandra Daddario). Shane and Rachel are in the throes of young love, but as they get to know each other better in this new, intimate environment, clouds of doubt appear - and by the time Shane's intrusive mother, Kitty (Molly Shannon) surprises them with an unwelcome visit, their fairytale honeymoon has begun to unravel. And finally, there is Tanya McQuoid (Jennifer Coolidge), a wealthy, unstable woman, recovering from the death of her mother, traveling alone to the hotel, looking for love and in desperate need of a massage."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra
Moj život s Liberaceom
programme.desc:
Behind the Candelabra: Directed by Steven Soderbergh. With Matt Damon, Scott Bakula, Eric Zuckerman, Eddie Jemison. A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1291580/","name":"Behind the Candelabra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg0OTY2OTM0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTk4OTQ1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the tempestuous six-year romance between megastar singer Liberace and his young lover Scott Thorson.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1291580/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sergeant_Tibbs"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally a film that suits Soderbergh's voyeuristic and clinical style.","reviewBody":"It's starting to look like 2013 is Soderbergh's year. Side Effects and Behind The Candelabra seem to be my favourite of his career so far, though that's only relatively, as I'm not a big fan of him. I do have Out Of Sight on my to see list coming up soon and I do need to give Traffic another watch before I make any final assessment on him. Although Soderbergh is frequently the director, cinematography and editor on his projects, he may be efficient but he's far too clinical, pushing the audience as an observer that it's difficult to feel emotionally involved in his films. I can't get excited for his half-baked premises that most likely haven't been fulfilled to their potential. However, Behind The Candelabra may be the first film I've seen of his that suits his style ideally. His style is still distant and voyeuristic, but in this bizarre world where Liberace adopts his lover for a son and pays for plastic surgery to make him look like himself, it feels more deliberate to keep us at a distance.

Instead, the scenes of dramatic conflict, decision and choice are played off for jokes and it's really effective, always earning belly laughs with its brilliant one-liners without feeling like it's silly. Perhaps its nervous laughter but it makes for an entertaining and interesting film. Michael Douglas is terrific as Liberace. I've never seen him take a character on like this. He's nearly up there with Sean Penn's Milk. It feels like it's been a while since Matt Damon has been in films I've wanted to watch and with this and Elysium, I've forgotten how reliable a lead he is. The characters inhabit a flashy world, but its kept on the costumes and sets which are incidental more than anything and the style of the film is kept subtle, besides a great choice of swooping cameras. It does have its flaws with nearly soap opera-esque structure and conflict but my expectations were very low so this is a pleasant surprise. I think I even prefer it to Side Effects.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42234,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2013-05-26","keywords":"pianist,gay adoption,boy toy,gay relationship,based on real person","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi510240281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMDc4NTM2OTFeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA2NTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000140/","name":"Michael Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001752/","name":"Steven Soderbergh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024560/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1281443/","name":"Scott Thorson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5674732/","name":"Alex Thorleifson"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Wizard of Lies
Čarobnjak za laži
programme.desc:
The Wizard of Lies: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Robert De Niro, Diana Henriques, Nathan Darrow, Alessandro Nivola. The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1933667/","name":"The Wizard of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIxOTMxNzc1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyOTUxMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1933667/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"admin-22725"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Big Short It Is Not","reviewBody":"An interesting attempt to weave a story line on the Madoff ponzi scheme but one that in the end is disjoint, incomplete, and largely unsatisfying. It certainly falls far short of other great financial movies – the Big Short, Margin Call, and Smartest Guys in the Room, to name a few. Worth watching but not likely a movie to savor, add closure, provide moral assurance, or make you feel anything. Too many moving pieces that lack grounding – the timeline has no center and the flashbacks and jumps forward are too disjoint, too many supporting characters are painted as morally ambiguous, and the many defrauded clients are nameless and faceless. 

As for the some of the details, it's hard to get around Michelle Pfeiffer accent. It may be spot-on but the voice is just annoying. Add in Robert De Niro's unbalanced intonations and a discordant soundtrack and sound-editing and it is not a movie that will sit well with your ears.

It should have been done as a 3-4 part mini-series. They would have had a lot more time to not only relay the full time line and details of the case but also go into the many interesting sub-stories and tragedies. For example, the efforts of Harry Markopolos to unmask the fraud is addressed only by showing Bernie and Ruth watching 30 seconds of testimony on the TV in their condo. The questions of the hundreds of millions potentially transferred to London accounts for the benefit of Madoff relatives is not explored. The ineptitude of the SEC, FINRA and other agencies is also given short-shrift. Did you know that Shana Madoff, the chief compliance officer and niece of Bernie Madoff, married an Assistant Director of the Office of Compliance Investigations and Examinations at the SEC. They met in 2003 when he was performing an examination as to whether Madoff was running a Ponzi scheme. The SEC Director of Compliance Investigations and Examinations attended their wedding in 2007. 

As it is, the movie dips its toe into the $64.8B (yes $64.8 billion) fraud case and provides some insights as to who in the inner circle may or may not have been culpable– all in the course largely telling a family drama. Interesting and entertaining, yes. A good film, meh. Disappointing for what it could have been, most definitely.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-05-20","keywords":"financial fraud,financier,ponzi scheme,fraudster,fraud","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tonight 8/7c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi42121497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Bernie Madoff and his Ponzi scheme."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506094/","name":"Sam Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2331718/","name":"John Burnham Schwartz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345603/","name":"Samuel Baum"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

Fahrenheit 451
programme.desc: Fahrenheit 451: Directed by Ramin Bahrani. With Michael B. Jordan, Aaron Davis, Cindy Katz, Michael Shannon. In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0360556/","name":"Fahrenheit 451","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM1ZGJkZDgtNzBlNS00YjkyLTk3NGEtZTIxMGVkMTk2Yjg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young woman - and begins to rebel against society.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0360556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"smoke0"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch Equilibrium and the 1966 film instead of this mess","reviewBody":"Subject line says it all, if you want an updated Fahrenheit 451, watch Equilibrium, and for true context, watch the original adaptation from 1966, as both are superior to this silly mess. I won't even go into the reasons why this film is bad, it just is, and other reviews have touched on many points why. Both films I cite above are far more entertaining and insightful, as this film has absolutely nothing to say."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19020,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-20","keywords":"dystopia,book burning,flamethrower,emoji,based on novel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjEwZjI5YzAtMzlmNC00YzVkLTgzOTgtNGM0ZmIyZDU3M2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a terrifying care-free future, a young man, Guy Montag, whose job as a fireman is to burn all books, questions his actions after meeting a young girl...and begins to rebel against society."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0430107/","name":"Michael B. A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5855772/","name":"Napszállta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJkNTFhMzQtOTJjMy00NmNkLWJjMDItZjFiYjg4ZTRiNzY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young girl grows up to become a strong and fearless woman in Budapest before World War I.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5855772/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cesminigar"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely tedious","reviewBody":"Couldn't get myself to watch the second half. Dialogues were dull, plot was not interesting, couldn't relate to any character or felt for any of them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4040,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2018-09-27","keywords":"long take,austro hungarian empire,female protagonist,anarchism,prostitution","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984098329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU4MzY0ODMtYmI1NS00NmZiLTllYjYtMjhjZTliODk1ZGI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU4MzY0ODMtYmI1NS00NmZiLTllYjYtMjhjZTliODk1ZGI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"1913, Budapest, in the heart of Europe as World War I approaches. The young Irisz Leiter arrives in the Hungarian capital with high hopes to work as a milliner at Leiter, the legendary hat store that once belonged to her late parents; but she is quickly sent away by the new owner, Oszkár Brill. While preparations are under way at the store, to host important, wealthy, royal guests, a man abruptly comes to Irisz, looking for a Kálmán Leiter, who he says is her brother. Refusing to leave the city, the young woman follows Kálmán's tracks, her only link to a lost past. Her quest brings her through the dark streets of Budapest, where only the Leiter hat store shines, into the turmoil of a civilization on the eve of its downfall."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3769837/","name":"Juli Jakab"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412096/","name":"Vlad Ivanov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7257783/","name":"Evelin Dobos"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1841577/","name":"László Nemes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0123200/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143783/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0475594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1841577/","name":"László Nemes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6600340/","name":"Clara Royer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3093523/","name":"Matthieu Taponier"}],"duration":"PT2H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter I Odaja Tajni
programme.desc:
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson, Richard Griffiths. An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295297/","name":"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcxODgwMDkxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDk2MDg3._V1_.jpg","description":"An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295297/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aussie-21"},"dateCreated":"2002-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the target of this movie...but still enjoyable.","reviewBody":"Not being a fan of the Harry Potter Movies, I toddled along to the first showing of this movie at my local UGC Cinema and sat down and thirly enjoyed this movie, but not in the way that I would enjoy something like the Lord of The Rings or Spider-Man. Of course Harry Potter's target audience is of a younger age so I can see how I might not have enjoyed it as much as a slightly younger audience, but to say the least it is a lot better than some of the crap that is fizzled out these days. 

Crap this is not and a year on the main characters are a lot older, taller and voices broken. Many of the original cast return and a few new characters appear in this such as Kenneth Branagh and Jason Isaacs. Kenneth Branagh plays a wonderful part of Gilderoy Lockhart who seems to think he's adored by all and quite frankly he is adored by women for his charm and bravery. He was one of the better bits in the movie as was Jason Isaacs who played Lucius Malfoy father of Draco. Jason sports a nice long wig and plays the evil father/villian down to a T. He plays it much like his villian in The Patriot. I was sometimes phased by Rupert Grint's "Ron". He isn't that great an actor, but he could play his part satisfactory. He could have done better, but then again I have not read the book so I would not know how Ron would have behaved. I guess the scenes he played a scary person (which was quite a lot) in weren't convincing enough for me, but kids should get a good laugh out of him more than I did. I suppose you can't hold it against the kids who aren't up to par because they're just young and learning the actors trade, but for those who play their part well they should get a pat in the back. 

The SFX were impressive, especally the character of Dobby. He was well great. I couldnt tell he was CG by his bad creation, but through the fact there was no way they could have done it otherwise. In fact the CG character of Dobby is very similar looking to Gollum in Lord of The Rings and the CG Asgard in television series Stargate SG-1 (speaking of textures) which which speaks well for Stargate SG-1 if it can do just as good as a top movie like this...and top it is. The CG Spiders were incredibly creepy and realistic looking. Not being too scared of Spiders, they kind of made me jump. I felt by body tense up as the gave case to Harry and Ron, which is a good thing because not often do I find myself doing this in movies. The person I had sat beside seemed pretty scared of the spiders as well.

 John Williams score was very much like his original score with old themes returning and some of the music sounding like music from his Indiana Jones scores. I found myself whistling the main theme of Harry Potter for most of the night and on occasion not realizing I was doing it until someone else pointed it out to me. 

This movie certainly had better action sequences and a lot more action geared than The 1st Potter movie. I found myself clenching up at points as they were really tense. The story wasn't too difficult to understand from a non-potter-fan point of view and the film was a lot shorter than I expected. I had thought it ran for three hours when it was more like 2 1/2. In some cases I found that you had to have seen the 1st movie to understand some of what was going on, but that was mainly due to the back story of he who shall not be uttered and some of the gags. The only thing that annoyed me was that the cues in the Foyer were too long and I couldnt get an ice cream and there was some little toddler crying down the front row for a few minutes mid-way. Why bring a toddler who's going forget about the film by next week? You may ask this yourself. 

If you're not a mad-potter-fan then I would suggest you wait a few weeks so that you're not over run with humans who stand 4 feet tall...ie. CHILDREN! (I'm not talking about Dwarves)

I'd give it 8.5/10. But I am not a huge fan of these movies and I am not the target audience. That's a good thing in case you were wondering.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":585747,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2003-01-15","keywords":"invisibility cloak,sequel,wizard,basilisk,killing a monster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1705771289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. Rowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460141/","name":"Steve Kloves"}],"duration":"PT2H41M"}</script><metacontent="

In some cases I found that you had to have seen the 1st movie to understand some of what was going on, but that was mainly due to the back story of he who shall not be uttered and some of the gags. The only thing that annoyed me was that the cues in the Foyer were too long and I couldnt get an ice cream and there was some little toddler crying down the front row for a few minutes mid-way. Why bring a toddler who's going forget about the film by next week? You may ask this yourself. 

If you're not a mad-potter-fan then I would suggest you wait a few weeks so that you're not over run with humans who stand 4 feet tall...ie. CHILDREN! (I'm not talking about Dwarves)

I'd give it 8.5/10. But I am not a huge fan of these movies and I am not the target audience. That's a good thing in case you were wondering.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":585747,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2003-01-15","keywords":"invisibility cloak,sequel,wizard,basilisk,killing a monster","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1705771289","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI3ZjNhNjYtODhjOC00NjlkLWE4MTItMDhiOGVmZmIwOWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705356/","name":"Daniel Radcliffe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342488/","name":"Rupert Grint","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914612/","name":"Emma Watson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159772/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746830/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Monsters, Inc
Čudovišta iz ormara
programme.desc:
Monsters, Inc.: Directed by Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich. With John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi. In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0198781/","name":"Monsters, Inc.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NTI0ODUyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTEyNjQ0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0198781/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016"},"dateCreated":"2003-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does For Monsters What "Toy Story" Did For Toys!","reviewBody":"Monsters, Inc.

We were all, at one time, scared of monsters under the bed. Shadows of clothes in the closet. Weird sounds outside in the trees. I remember thinking there were all kinds of monsters in my room - not as much under my bed as in the closet. And once again, Pixar, who brought us "Toy Story" 1 & 2, plays on both adults' memories and children's dreams, making it equally enjoyable for both children and adults.

John Goodman voices James P. Sullivan, known as "Sulley" to friends. He is a big, blue, hairy monster with horns on his head and hands the size of a watermelon. Billy Crystal is Mike Wazowski, his wisecracking, one-eyed best friend. Both of these monsters live in Monstropolis, a world where monsters roam freely. Their city is powered by a rare source of power - children's screams. That is where Monsters, Incorporated comes in. At Monsters, Inc., monsters like Sulley and Mike open portals into children's rooms - through closet doors - and scare the children, capturing their scream in a little yellow bottle. Sulley is the top-scarer, bringing in the most scares. But Randall (the always enjoyable - even when animated - Steve Buscemi), a wormy, multiple-armed lizard-monster with the ability to change appearances to its surroundings, is jealous of Sulley, and will attempt anything to get more scares...even if it means taking a child from the real world and bringing it into Monstropolis. But after the child escapes, Sulley and Mike reluctantly look after it, all the while trying to get it back to the real world before Mr. Waternoose (the late James Coburn) and others find out about the incident...

"Monsters, Inc." does for monsters what "Toy Story" did for toys. Pixar once again not only expands our mind, but our very worlds. I respect their company and commitment values very much, as you can read in my "Toy Story" review. They stick to the values that made Disney films so family-friendly back in the fifties and sixties: Respect for the audience, respect for quality, and respect for the audience's INTELLIGENCE, something Disney, who has recently coughed up a bunch of lousy, thoughtless sequels, has forgotten. Now, I know that LEGALLY Disney is co-creator of "Toy Story" and "Monsters, Inc.," but they really are not. They just give Pixar the money and get their name branded on the front box of the film. And even then, I have heard multiple claims that Disney is very mean-spirited towards Pixar (read into sequel trouble for "Toy Story 3") and gives them the bare minimum.

But that is straying off the subject. "Monsters, Inc." is one of the most enjoyable animated films I have ever had the pleasure of viewing. I didn't enjoy it as much the first time, but I then bought it, and have since watched it many times. It is an instant classic. I will be watching it years from now, when I am old and frail and in a rocking chair. It ranks right up there with "Toy Story" 1 & 2, and all the OLDER Disney films from the 50's-70's. It has all the elements of a sweet, charming, emotional and pleasurably good-natured animated film. And, more coudos to Pixar: Thank you for not packing it full of the language and inappropriate content that Disney shoves into the dark recesses of their films nowadays.

Not only has Pixar brought back the "Family Film" genre to what it should be, but it also redefines it. Pixar's animated films are some of the most thoughtful, imaginative and enjoyable animated films ever - not to mention 100 % family safe. Thank you, Pixar, for getting back on track.

5/5 stars","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":853368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2002-04-10","keywords":"monster world,monster,human nonhuman relationship,portal door,scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3D Re-release Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi518890521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc5NTE4OTI3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc5NTE4OTI3OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDQ4NjMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000345/","name":"Billy Crystal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316701/","name":"Mary Gibbs"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798899/","name":"David Silverman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881279/","name":"Lee Unkrich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0230032/","name":"Pete Docter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191717/","name":"Jill Culton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0682066/","name":"Jeff Pidgeon"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="
